price: 215. Ir būk malonus ir nuolankus tikintiesiems, kurie seka tavimi.
arabic: وَٱخۡفِضۡ جَنَاحَكَ لِمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-ikh'fiḍ janāḥaka limani ittabaʿaka mina al-mu'minīna
